name: On the End of the Road (ceciltheawesome)
name_original: On the End of the Road (ceciltheawesome)
description: A short twine piece, made for the fortnightly fiction jam, about the last waffle house I stopped at during my year living on the road, which ended abruptly due to the COVID pandemic. The theme was transition phase, and that meal happened at the intersection of a lot of transitions in my life.
